title: Let me explain...
creator_credit: Samantha Van Zanen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Samantha Van Zanen’s story starts with a dramatic childbirth but mostly reflects on the darkest years of her life as she coped with having Turner’s Syndrome. The bullying, needles and anguish were alleviated somewhat by her family and close friends.
creator_credit_for_label: Samantha Van Zanen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
